newsitem.title: LEBANON: Solidere shares rise on higher turnover.
newsitem.headline: Solidere shares rise on higher turnover.

text.p: Solidere shares picked up on higher turnover on the Beirut Stock Exchange on Wednesday . A shares rose to $113.50 from Tuesday's $110.5 and B shares also rose to $114.75 from $114.25.
Turnover in Solidere shares was 15,645 shares up from Tuesday's 11,739 and value was $1,775,537.375 from $1,316,855.
Also traded on the BSE were 1,330 Ciments Libanais at $1.21875, down from $1.25 on November 25 when they were last traded.
There was no trade in the shares of the three other listed companies: Ciments Blancs, Eternit and Uniceramic.
The LISPI stock index rose 0.08 percent to 82.52 and the BLOM stock index rose 1.29 percent to 964.65.
